name: Cut the String
description:
*Submitted to the Interactive Fiction Game Jam*

How does it feel to end someone's journey? You were destined to cut the strings of life and now you're faced with a bitter reality of your calling.

"I think about my job a lot and how it feels to end a cycle. Ending the cycle and not having a say. A child could have just started experiencing the pleasures of life or an elderly person who never found their life’s purpose, either way it all ends the same, I cut the string."
